law.catch_line: To qualify for a permit, a corporation or partnership shall meet the requirements of this section....

text.section: To qualify for a permit, a corporation or partnership shall meet the requirements of this section.

section.section: A corporation or partnership shall have appointed at least 1 responsible member of the corporation or partnership.
A responsible member shall be in responsible charge of landscape architecture practiced through the corporation or partnership.

The responsible member shall be:
an officer of a corporation or a partner of a partnership; and
a licensed landscape architect.
